de.japi.components

Class Japi2RadioButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.AbstractButton
            • javax.swing.JToggleButton
              • javax.swing.JRadioButton
                • de.japi.components.Japi2RadioButton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants

    public class Japi2RadioButton
extends javax.swing.JRadioButton
    RadioButton class to construct Radio Buttons based on JRadioButton, which inherits from AbstractButton.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Japi2RadioButton

        public Japi2RadioButton(java.lang.String title)
        In contrast to the orignial version, the constructor for Japi2RadioButton takes only a titel as an argument. The Button Group to which the Radio Button should belong is set in the showRadioButton-Method in class ConstrucionCalls.java
        Parameters:
        title -
